import { useRef } from "react"; import "./App.css"; import Pageheader from "./Components/Header/Header"; function App() { const sectionRefs = useRef([]); const handleSection = (sectionId) => { const element = sectionRefs.current[sectionId]; const headerHeight = document.querySelector(".header").offsetHeight; // Get the height of the fixed header const sectionTop = element.getBoundingClientRect().top + window.scrollY; // Get the top position of the section relative to the viewport const scrolledY = sectionTop - headerHeight; // Calculate the position to scroll to, considering the fixed header height window.scrollTo({ top: scrolledY, behavior: "smooth", }); }; return (
(sectionRefs.current["about"] = el)} style={{ display: "flex", justifyContent: "center", backgroundColor: "#0a192f", minHeight: "89vh", color: " whitesmoke", }} >

Hi , My name is

Mehdi.

I am Web Developer

I'm a software engineer specializing in building and designing exceptional digital experiences

(sectionRefs.current["work"] = el)} >

); } export default App;
